name: ChargeStatus
0:
”Alexa, ask Charge Status what is the battery level on my phone?”
”Alexa, ask Charge Status is my computer plugged in?”
”Alexa, ask Charge Status to report”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: charge status
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Never run out of power again: Charge Status is the easiest way to monitor the charging status and battery level on your Android device.

Charge Status provides simple monitoring of your charging status and battery level from anywhere. Find us online at https://www.chargestatus.com.

Charge Status is simple: connect your phone or computer using our Android app or Chrome extension, and once you connect your Alexa account you can instantly check the battery level on all your devices, or check if a computer is plugged in just by asking.
